Title: U.S., Iran to hold nuclear program talks. And, Dems unveil new list of DHS demands
Description:
The U.S.
and Iran begin high-stakes talks today over Iran's nuclear program.
And, Democrats unveil a detailed list of demands to change how DHS immigration enforcement officers operate.

Title: Minneapolis now has daily deportation flights. One man has been documenting them
Description: A professional airplane enthusiast has been tracking the federally chartered deportation flights out of the Minneapolis airport as DHS sends immigration detainees to other states and, eventually, other countries.

Title: Virginia Democrats show map to counter Trump redistricting but its future is unclear
Description: The new map still requires approval from the courts and the voters but, if enacted, it could help Democrats win four more House seats

Title: Dog sled, ski ballet and other sports you could once see at the Winter Olympics
Description:
For many decades, Olympic Games included "demonstration sports." Some, like curling, became part of the permanent roster.
But others, like skijoring, didn't stick around.

Title: Argentina and US sign a major trade deal to slash tariffs and boost political alliance
Description: The deal slashes hundreds of reciprocal tariffs between the two countries.

Title: Airbus is making a rugged tablet for helicopter crews to control a drone team while flying at high speed
Description: The firm said it recently tested the software with Singapore's air force, where a chopper crew used an ISR drone to find a target in the rainforest.

Title: A consultant who called the AI software collapse almost a year ago says no part of the business will escape 'unscathed'
Description: Michelle Miller at AlixPartners discusses AI's pressure on software stocks, urging companies to adapt to major industry changes.

Title: TechEx Global returns to London with enterprise technology and AI execution
Description:
London, TechEx Global 2026, one of Europe’s biggest enterprise technology conferences, brought thousands of technology professionals together at Olympia London on 4 and 5 February.
The event went beyond buzzwords, focusing on how emerging technologies, especi…

Title: Tony Robbins says US Congress quietly unlocked a door that America’s ultra-rich have used for decades. Capitalize now
Description: "All you have to do is take a test.”

Title: Bitcoin whales and ETFs are baling out of the market; UBS warns ‘crypto is not an asset’
Description: “We see few bullish indicators that suggest we may be approaching the bottom,” Jefferies analyst Andrew Moss says.

Title: Elon Musk raises eyebrows with unexpected announcement about long-awaited Tesla tech: 'This doesn't seem to be the solution'

Description:
If you love the idea of hacking IKEA pieces, but not so much doing it yourself, then it’s time to meet B.ARC.

Title: I Now Assume That All Ads on Apple News Are Scams
Description: Many ads in Apple News served by Taboola are clearly scams.

Title: US Immigration on the Easiest Setting
